1.content: The names Bryan, i am about to tell you about how my life changed forever. but first i want to tell you about who i was. i used to be a student in a small college town, i did go to the college but because of the tale i am going to spin you will find out what happened about that. i remember being a shy geeky kid though my body wasn't that bad to begin with it was about an average build and finally i stood at a tall 6'4 i had shaggy dark brown hair a beard and glasses. but that is enough about who i used to be. now let's get to the interesting part. shall we?
1.title: A freindly intoduction

11.content: You found an ancient medallion that dates back to IVth century and has a Greek inscription upon itself . You didn't know this medallion imprisoned the ancient Greek Gods; a Neoplatonic magician made this artifact in order to confine their wrath for ever. Then Christianity spread and Zeus, Poseidon, Hera, Athena and others were forgotten. What did you do?
11.title: Greek gods and transformation.

The mall, where you were planning on hanging out with friends
1112.content:
You stare at the medallion in your hand. It's a thin bronze disk, about as round as a pop can, and is attached to a thin, delicate bronze chain. It looks like it belongs in a museum if it's real, not in your pocket. The face of the medallion is elegantly engraved, although you can't read any of it. What you do notice is that it looks as if it's unfinished; there's an outer ring with a sentence of text, but the rest of the medallion is blank. There's an inner ring, where it looks like there should be an image of some sort, as well as a smaller scroll-like area for a caption, but neither of them are filled in. Tracing your hand over it, it's very well polished, furthering your idea that this was likely difficult to make. It was probably a gift for an emperor or something; maybe they died, which is why it's unfinished? As you continue to hold it in your hand, you realize how warm it feels, despite there being no reason for it to be.

You place the medallion back in your pocket, planning to research it and see what the text says when you get home later tonight. Before that, though, you continue on your way towards...
1112.title: Mysterious Medallion

On my way to school one day, they was another murder case, I saw the body but it was like nothing I've seen before, mainly cause the victim was gray in the face and it looked like his skin was cracking off. Right when I got near to school I heard a noise that sounded like metal tapping on the ground, following my every move. When I turned around I saw what looked like a robotic bug that would fit in the palm of my hand, it was. . .

121.content: I was surprised to see this thing it was like nothing i had ever seen before. The robotic spider was metallic silver with some sections of it being orange. It kept crawling up to me, as if it wanted only me. I then. . .
121.title: A spider

choices: An announcement to evacuate was order
1211.content: As if on order, it went into my hand. I was still wondering what it was thought, although I really never got the chance cause I had to rush to school, not noticing the belt the was around my waist now. At school, I went though a normal day until. . .
1211.title: Held my hand out for

12112.content: As everyone started to evacuate, I didn't know why but I felt that something was off. Unfortunately I was right when I got outside to see some of my fellow students in the same state as the murder victims. Other students were either crying for their friends or vomiting in the corners from the sight. Our school principle then got in front of all of us where he did the most f**k up thing I seen. He smiled at the sight as he started to laugh and suddenly changed into a freakish bug like mutant. All the other student were scared at the sight, although I wasn't, for the fact that I was completely pissed off after he said that he was part of the organization that caused the murder cases and was planning to murder us all. I the gripped the mechanical spider in my hand as I noticed the belt around my waist. I cursed him out as I then yell "HENSHIN!" and placed the spider on the belt. The spider then repeated what I had said as a bulky armor appeared around me.
12112.title: An announcement to evacuate was order

121122.content: I rushed into the monster, not caring about the armor I was wear or wondering how I knew what to do, I just fought as more of the insects appeared.
121122.title: I was enraged

1211221.content: I suddenly grabbed the four legs on the both sides of the spider and pressed them together, the bulky part of the armor that I was wearing then started separated from me as orange electricity surged through my body. "Cast Off." I then turned the spider to it's side as it repeated and sent the excess armor flying and hitting some of the insect creatures. "Change Spider." The machine said as it revealed a more flexible armor that was orange and black and appeared to a webbing pattern on my chest, my helmet had an orange visor that looked like bug eyes. I glared deeply into the insects as I then rushed in and continued fighting.
1211221.title: Cast Off.

12112211.content: I didn't know how I was doing what I did, but I just went with it as I press the button on the side of the belt. "Clock Up" Everything then started to slow down as I realized that I was in a hyper space like moment. I rushed in and continued fighting the slowed enemies that were no longer aware of my presence.
12112211.title: Cloak Up

121122111.content: I then realized that I needed to end this as I pressed the three buttons on the spider. The spider then repeated the numbers as I put the spider back in it's previous position then quickly placed it back as I said "_____________" and the belt repeated it.

1211221111.content: I clenched my fist as hard as I could, all the hatred I had for the creatures that caused all the murders going around. I brought it back and then delivered a fierce blow to all at the creatures that were gathered together, destroying all of them instantly in a massive explosion.
1211221111.title: Rider Punch

12112211111.content: I took a breath as I looked around. The creatures were all gone and the other students were passed out. I pressed the button on the side of my belt as it said "Clock Over". Time resumes as I took off the spider on my belt and returned to normal. I probably knew that somewhere, there were more of them. I then heard a voice in my head that told me the name of that form. "Kamen Rider Tsuchigumo" I knew then that my life has changed forever.
12112211111.title: Clock Over

121122111112.content: A week passed since I got the armor. I still don't know how I knew what to do or how I knew it's name was "Kamen Rider Tsuchigumo". I also started to notice other thing that changed about me after I first put on the armor. My muscles grew a bit, my eyesight got better and I became more athletic. I was strange but I guess something knew I would need to be stronger to fight those monsters. The spider for some reason liked to hang out in my backpack and strangely made sure no one saw it. School was closed for funerals for the people that died last week. I wasn't anyone I knew but I decided to attend.
121122111112.title: A week later

1211221111121.content: There hasn't been any recent monster attacks, which was a good thing for now but I kept the mechanical spider on me just in case. All was fine when. . .
1211221111121.title: Moving on

13.content:
You were out for a quiet stroll through the first when you saw a strange path. You weren't used to this part of the woods, so you decided to take a look and see what it was. The way was paved by the dirt and rock which barely made a barrier to the cabin at the end.

You approached the modern looking cabin and knocked on the door exactly three times to introduce yourself. The door opened and looking at you with a seductive grin was a 43 year old brunette woman who was shaped like a pear. She had luscious curves on her chubby but not fat body.

"Well come in!" She said to you as you awkwardly smiled and accepted her invitation. Inside she led you to the living room, and sat down across from you.

"I am Sandra! I've lived her for 200 long years, and let's cut to the chase. I'm a witch." You look at her with confusion and disbelief as she says back "No, watch. I'll prove it." She waves her pointer finger around at you and cuffs emerge from the seat, trapping you in the den of the witch.


"It's been a while since I've had a guest, so I'll be treating you quite specially." Sandra said as she starts to explain what she does
13.title: option 3

131111.title: "Sorry I'm lesbian" keep your inter...

choices: turn you into a little girl.
give birth to you as a girl.
135.content:
"You see... young lady." Grinning, Sandra said. "I have been seeking out and training young people with hidden talent for magic for several years but now I am close to my own time." She sighed, eying you. "I need a daughter to pass my knowledge to so she can continue the family business."

"Daughter...?" Confused, you asked. "You do know I'm a guy, right?"

Sandra giggled, her hooped earrings jingling as she did so. "Not for long, my dear." Bemused, she said. "I already told you, I am a witch. I can easily change your gender, not to mention your age. However, there is a reason I chose you in particular."

You gulped. "Dare I ask what that reason was?"

"Your potential for magic is higher than anyone I had ever encountered." Excitement in her voice, Sandra replied. "Also, you have a high threshold for pain which means I can teach you all of the transformative spells and curses." She gave a happy giggle and added, you are too perfect for me to pass up!"

"What are you going to do with me?" Fearful, I demanded.

Sandra gave you a more gentle smile. "I'm going to adopt you, of course." With a slight blush, she replied. "Only to have full magical claim upon you, I must first..."
135.title: A family affair.

14.content:
I scratch my hand. The liquid I had just spilt on myself burned. I curse my clumsiness, I had just meant to look at the strange substance. Suddenly my body gets tingly all over. Before I have a chance to panic, the world around me appears to be getting bigger. But as my clothes slide off my body, I realize I am the one changing size. The downward motion continues until I am buried under the mound of fabric that used to be my clothes. It takes me a minute to find my way out.

I stand, amazed by the size of my surroundings. I see that I am....

Option 1 - At my cousins house. Even though Sammy is five years younger than me, we have always been like friends. We live in the same town, so I spend a lot of time hanging out with her. Sammy has long brown hair and bright blue eyes. Despite the fact that she's is my cousin, I have always thought she is attractive. Sammy is very playfully and loves to mess around with me.

Option 2 - At the beach. I am surrounded by a people in swimsuits, obvious to the tiny dude under their feet.

Options 3 - In a forest. There does not apply to be anyone around.
14.title: option 4

info.brief_description: anything goes if there is a transformation/story involved. GP for good/fun adds.
info.description:
this is a story where you can do anything to me with one exception (no guy on guy). i will write one chapter being the first one then it is completely up to you to decide how i change, what i change into, if anyone else gets changed. this is kinda an experiment to see where this concept goes so go at it.

I will give out GP to anyone's post that i find good or interesting or anything really. so please add

rules:
there is only one and that is no guy on guy

other then that it is all fair game
